languages.text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their current {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if they kill an enemy. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Once per round the wielder gains +2 AP and +2 MP in their current turn if they kill an enemy. Base armour property: +20 Strength.
Once per round, the wearer gains +2 AP and +2 MP on their current turn if they kill an enemy. Base armour property: +20 Strength.

languages.text: 当装备者在自己的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内杀死敌人时，获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，此效果每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}只能触发一次。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：+20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。

languages.text: Une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, l'utilisateur reçoit +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pour le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} en cours s'il élimine un ennemi.
